name: Night of Shooting the Dead
description:
You, your gun, and a whole lotta zombies.

It's the zombie apocalypse, and you are caught out in the open! Luckily, your have your gun to provide ample defense against the zombies.  Survive as many days as possible, but beware of the nights! 

Controls:

WASD for movement

Mouse to aim and click to fire

Created by Jubliani
